The Bone Snatcher is about a group miners who go on a search for a missing crew of miners in the Namib Desert. When the find them, the crew are found in an area with a mass amount of fossilized bone and what seems like thousands of scorpions. So what are possible threats to ourselves under the sand? Radioactive frogs, wild preacher men, electric eels, Knuckle Dragger Dinos, and Abandoned World War II Armed Vehicles.

Snow White is in my opinion a bad movie on an artistic point of view. The plot is pretty much foreseeable, the characters are stereotypes, the editing too. The movie is pale by comparison to more recent Disney fairy tales, thanks to computer graphics. The biggest mistake to me is that Snow White was pretty much devoid of magic.
